name: Chimp Copter
description:
CHIMP COPTER

A ridiculous flying gauntlet of finger-pedaling endurance.

[click on the game's window to enable browser controls]

CONTROLS:

Left Arrow  - Left Pedal

Right Arrow  - Right Pedal

A - Tilt Left

D - Tilt Right

 Alternate your pedals to gain lift. Don't forget to land and take a break at helipads to rest your fingers and repair your copter!

(Tip: You can also use the mouse buttons to pedal.)

"Chimp Copter" - Entry for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3 for the theme "Cycles". Created in 4 days by Dominick John (@dominickjohn), music track by Dan Span (@danspanmusic).
